caption.p: Histopathological changes in kidney of rats after 28 days of treatment in males rats (400X). (K0) control; (K1) wistar strain rats treated with 250 mg/kg fruits extracts of P. capense; (K2) wistar strain rats treated with 500 mg/kg fruits extracts of P. capense; (K3) wistar strain rats treated with 1000 mg/kg fruits extracts of P. capense s, L: Cell lysis, G: glomerulus, EU: urinary tract, D: distal convoluted tubule, P: proximal convoluted tubule.
